[00:00.00]Feel The Love (Explicit) - KIDS SEE GHOSTS/Pusha T
[00:03.17]Producer：Kanye West/Dot Da Genius/Mike Dean
[00:06.35]Kid Cudi：
[00:09.53]I can still feel the love
[00:13.74]I can still feel the love
[00:18.08]I can still feel the love
[00:23.02]Feel the love
[00:24.67]Pusha-T/Kid Cudi/Kanye West：
[00:27.28]We not worried 'bout no other n**gas we them other n**gas
[00:31.46]You bust down a Rollie I bust down a brick then I flood it n**ga
[00:35.87]I am not to be compared to you rappers Eazy-Duz-It n**ga
[00:40.07]I am more Eazy you tryin' your best to become me n**ga
[00:43.53]She like them bottles with bubbles in it
[00:45.71]Buy her Loewe and other linen
[00:47.89]Why would I wait when there's other women
[00:50.01]Why would I hate
[00:50.64]We in love with winnin' ooh
[00:52.75]Buy her bundles fly her out bring her friend I try her out
[00:56.98]Ain't no worries findin' out the details is ironed out
[01:01.47]Easily they plays along hopin' that I play a song
[01:05.72]Love to f**k to trap music feel the love
[01:08.04]Dope money just came along woo
[01:09.41]Kanye West/Kid Cudi：
[01:10.00]Grrrat-gat I can still feel the love
[01:11.88]Gat-gat gat ga-gat-ga-ga-gat

[01:19.26]Gat-gat-gat-gat feel the love
[01:20.72]Ga-ga-gat ga-gat ga-gat ga-gat-gat grrrat

[01:24.48]Ba-ba-ba-ba
[01:26.80]Brrrat-tat-da-da-da da

[01:40.50]Rude-rude-rude-rude-woo

data.trans:
[ti:Feel The Love (Explicit)]
[ar:KIDS SEE GHOSTS]
[al:KIDS SEE GHOSTS (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.17]//
[00:06.35]//
[00:09.53]我还能感受到爱
[00:13.74]我还能感受到爱
[00:18.08]我还能感受到爱
[00:23.02]感受到爱
[00:24.67]//
[00:27.28]我们不怕别人 我们就别人
[00:31.46]你的劳力士贬值了 我的货也贬值了 那我就掺点杂质在里面
[00:35.87]我才不和你们这些说唱歌手比较 《Eazy-Duz-It》知道吗 哥们
[00:40.07]我比Eazy更厉害 你拼了老命也没有我这么大的成就
[00:43.53]她喜欢啤酒里面有泡沫
[00:45.71]我给她买罗意威和各种高级衣服
[00:47.89]没有别的女人 我还等什么
[00:50.01]我有什么好恨的
[00:50.64]我们就是喜欢胜利的感觉
[00:52.75]我给她买各种玩意儿 坐飞机带她出去浪 我用她的朋友来考验她的忠诚
[00:56.98]不用担心 没必要在意那些细节
[01:01.47]他们在我面前晃 期待着我唱歌
[01:05.72]我喜欢上床 也喜欢Trap音乐 感受到这热爱
[01:08.04]钱和货就这样不请自来
[01:09.41]//
[01:10.00]我还能感受到爱
[01:11.88]//
[01:13.96]我还能感受到爱
